headline: The Score: Bumble, Tesla, Shell and More Stocks That Defined the Week
summary: Per a regulatory filing, Bumble expects the cuts to generate up to $40 million in annual savings.  Chief Executive  Whitney Wolfe Herd —who returned to the company in March—told employees in a letter Wednesday that she hopes the cuts make the company “more agile.”
